original: spyod dang dngos grub thams cad kyi skal ba go rims bzhin du bstan par bya'o/ /de nas me
analyzed: spyod dang dngos grub thams cad kyi skal ba go rims bzhin du bstan par bya'o/ /de nas me
translated: and destroying, and all powers, in order.🔽Then, having taken up the flower garland, one should throw it,

original: tog gi phreng ba bzung nas 'phang bar bya'o/ /pra t'itstsha badzra ho: zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de
analyzed: tog gi phreng ba bzung nas 'phang bar bya'o/ /pra t'itstsha badzra ho: zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de
translated: saying, Pratīccha vajra hoḥ!

original: nas des 'phangs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /aom pra ti🔽grihna tva mi mam sa tva ma h'a ba la zhes so/ /de nas slob ma'i mig dag la
analyzed: nas des 'phangs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /aom pra ti grihna tva mi mam sa tva ma h'a ba la zhes so/ /de nas slob ma'i mig dag la
translated: Then, one should tie the flower garland that was thrown🔽on his head, saying, “Oṃ pratigrihṇāstvaṃ mahābala.”🔽Then, having visualized the syllable oṃ in the eyes of the disciple,

original: aom yig 'bar ba dang bcas pa bsams te gdong g-yogs bsal bar bya'o/ /aom de ring rdo
analyzed: aom yig 'bar ba dang bcas pa bsams te gdong g-yogs bsal bar bya'o/ /aom de ring rdo
translated: one should remove the blindfold, saying, “Oṃ today I am born in the family of the tathāgatas.

original: rje sems dpa' rang/ /khyed kyi mig ni dbye bar mdzad/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa/
analyzed: rje sems dpa' rang/ /khyed kyi mig ni dbye bar mdzad/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa/
translated: The vajra eye, the unsurpassed,🔽opens all eyes.

original: /thams cad mig ni 'byed par mdzad/ /ces pas gdong g-yogs bsal bar bya'o/ /kye'i rdo rje ltos
analyzed: /thams cad mig ni 'byed par mdzad/ /ces pas gdong g-yogs bsal bar bya'o/ /kye'i rdo rje ltos
translated: Thus, one should remove the blindfold.🔽 One should say, Look at the Hevajra!

original: shig ces brjod nas so so'i zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyu la
analyzed: shig ces brjod nas so so'i zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyu la
translated: Beginning with the vajra hook of one's own mandala,🔽up to the Great Vairocana, one should show

original: sogs pa nas brtsams te rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i mthar thug par bstan
analyzed: sogs pa nas brtsams te rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i mthar thug par bstan
translated: the mandala.

original: @311b par bya'o/ /de la lha rnams kyi mtshan ma'i dam tshig la yang dad pa dang dang bas me tog gi phreng ba phog pa de'i rnal 'byor yang sbyin bar bya'o/ /yang
analyzed: @311b par bya'o/ /de la lha rnams kyi mtshan ma'i dam tshig la yang dad pa dang dang bas me tog gi phreng ba phog pa de'i rnal 'byor yang sbyin bar bya'o/ /yang
translated: There, in the commitment of the signs of the deities, one should also give the yoga of the one to whom the flower garland is offered, with faith and clarity.

original: na slob ma'i skal ba gang yod pa de'i rnal 'byor sbyin par bya'o zhes pa
analyzed: na slob ma'i skal ba gang yod pa de'i rnal 'byor sbyin par bya'o zhes pa
translated: Or, one should give the yoga of whatever fortune the disciple has, it is said.🔽 This is the ritual for inducting the disciple.

original: ni slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas shar gyi sgo la sogs pa rnams
analyzed: ni slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas shar gyi sgo la sogs pa rnams
translated: Then, at the eastern door, etc.,

original: su dkyil 'khor la yang phyag btsal bar bya'o/ /de nas shar gyi sgor rang gi thugs kar me
analyzed: su dkyil 'khor la yang phyag btsal bar bya'o/ /de nas shar gyi sgor rang gi thugs kar me
translated: Then, at the eastern gate, visualize a fire maṇḍala at one’s heart.🔽

original: tog gi snyim pa sbyar la lus kyis phyag btsal bar bya ste/ aom sarba ta th'a ga
analyzed: tog gi snyim pa sbyar la lus kyis phyag btsal bar bya ste/ aom sarba ta th'a ga
translated: Then, at the eastern door, one should make a gesture of homage to the maṇḍala with a handful of flowers at one’s heart, and make a prostration with one’s body:

original: ta k'a ya b'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro mi sarba ta🔽th'a ga t'ashts'a dhi tishtha sv'a m'am/ aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pa stha n'a
analyzed: ta k'a ya b'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro mi sarba ta th'a ga t'ashts'a dhi tishtha sv'a m'am/ aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pa stha n'a
translated: oṃ sarvatathāgata kāya vāk citta praṇamena vajra bandhanakaro mi🔽sarvatathāgatāścādhiṣṭhitaṃ svā mām

original: y'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa tv'a dhi tishtha m'am/ lho'i
analyzed: y'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa tv'a dhi tishtha m'am/ lho'i
translated: oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjopasthānāya ātmānaṃ niryātayāmi sarvatathāgatavajrasatvā dhiṣṭite māṃ

original: sgor rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar nas dpral ba sal btud de/ aom sarba ta th'a
analyzed: sgor rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar nas dpral ba sal btud de/ aom sarba ta th'a
translated: at the southern door, having joined the vajra palms at the heart, one should bow with the forehead:🔽oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjābhiṣekāya ātmānaṃ niryātayāmi

original: ga ta p'u dz'a bhi shi ka y'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi/ sarba ta th'a ga
analyzed: ga ta p'u dz'a bhi shi ka y'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi/ sarba ta th'a ga
translated: sarvatathāgatavajraratnābhiṣiñca māṃ

original: ta badzra ratn'a bhi shinytsa m'am/ de nas rdo rje'i thal mo spyi bor bzung nas zhal sa
analyzed: ta badzra ratn'a bhi shinytsa m'am/ de nas rdo rje'i thal mo spyi bor bzung nas zhal sa
translated: then, having held the vajra palms to the head, one should bow with the face:

original: la btud de nub kyi sgo nas/ aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a pra brtan y'atma n'am ni
analyzed: la btud de nub kyi sgo nas/ aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a pra brtan y'atma n'am ni
translated: Bowing with the head to the west,🔽one should make obeisance with the palms joined, touching the ground,🔽saying, “Oṃ, I am established in the offering to all tathāgatas.

original: ry'a ta y'a mi/ sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharma pra brta ya m'i/ de bzhin du
analyzed: ry'a ta y'a mi/ sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharma pra brta ya m'i/ de bzhin du
translated: I am established in the vajra Dharma of all tathāgatas.”🔽Similarly, in the north, one should bow with the head to the heart,

original: byang du mgo snying gar btud nas thal mo sbyar te sa la reg nas phyag btsal bar
analyzed: byang du mgo snying gar btud nas thal mo sbyar te sa la reg nas phyag btsal bar
translated: join the palms, touch the ground, and make obeisance,

original: bya'o/ /aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karma ni a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a
analyzed: bya'o/ /aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karma ni a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a
translated: saying, “Oṃ, I am established in the activity of offering to all tathāgatas.🔽I am established in the vajra activity of all tathāgatas.”

original: mi; sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru sv'a m'am/ zhes brjod nas phyag lnga btsal bar bya'o/
analyzed: mi; sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru sv'a m'am/ zhes brjod nas phyag lnga btsal bar bya'o/
translated: One should make five prostrations,

original: /de'i tshe yang slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi de bzhin nyid du byin gyis
analyzed: /de'i tshe yang slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi de bzhin nyid du byin gyis
translated: and at that time, the master should meditate on the consecration into the suchness of those tathāgatas.🔽Now, generate faith,

original: rlob par bsgom par bya'o/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /dkyil 'khor 'di de nyid la
analyzed: rlob par bsgom par bya'o/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /dkyil 'khor 'di de nyid la
translated: and behold this maṇḍala of suchness.🔽You are born into the family of the buddhas,

original: ltos/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/
analyzed: ltos/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/
translated: empowered by mantra and mudrā.

original: /phun sum tshogs kun mngon gyur te/ /khyod kyi dngos grub sbyor nyid kyang/
analyzed: /phun sum tshogs kun mngon gyur te/ /khyod kyi dngos grub sbyor nyid kyang/
translated: “All perfections will manifest, and you will attain the accomplishments🔽through guarding the commitments.

original: /dam tshig bsrung bas dngos grub 'gyur/ /sngags rnams la yang brtson par gyis/
analyzed: /dam tshig bsrung bas dngos grub 'gyur/ /sngags rnams la yang brtson par gyis/
translated: Strive also in the mantras.
